Package org.restlet.ext.spring

Integration with Spring Framework 3.0.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SpringBeanFinder An alternative to SpringFinder which uses Spring's BeanFactory mechanism to load a prototype bean by name.
SpringBeanRouter Restlet Router which behaves like Spring's BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping.
SpringComponent Component that is easily configurable from Spring.
SpringContext Spring application context based on a Restlet context.
SpringFinder Finder that is specialized for easier usage by Spring wiring services.
SpringHost Virtual host that is easily configurable with Spring.
SpringResource Spring Resource based on a Restlet Representation.
SpringRouter Router that is easily configurable with Spring.
SpringServer Server that is easily configurable with Spring.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.spring Description

Integration with Spring Framework 3.0.

Since:
Restlet 1.0
See Also:
Spring Framework
